name: SLAAAAYm
description:
SLAAAAYm

by Anton, Xiaohan, Nazeem.

1. Architecture:

The game is made in 2D in Unity. The music for the game was made in Fl Studio. All illustrations in the game were made in Procreate. 

2. Assets (graphics, sound effects, engine): 

All assets in the game were made on our own. All illustrations were made by Xiaohan and all music was made by Nazeem. The game was made by Anton.
